title: Slow cooker chicken chilli con carne
ingredients: ['900g skinless, boneless chicken breast meat, cubed', '1/2 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon Italian herb seasoning', '4 (400g) tins whole plum peeled tomatoes', '2 (410g) tins kidney beans, drained and rinsed', '35g chilli con carne seasoning mix, such as Schwartz', '1 (130g) tin diced green chillies', '1 onion, finely chopped', '3 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '120ml water']
